abstractText: This small-size illuminated black-paper manuscript, written in gold ink, contains the Pañcabuddhadhāraṇī, dedicated to the five Buddhas (Vairocana, Akṣobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitābha and Amoghasiddhi).
abstractShort: This small-size illuminated black-paper manuscript, written in gold ink, contains the Pañcabuddhadhāraṇī, dedicated to the
title: Pañcabuddhadhāraṇī
